>From: CMai <CMai@...>
>To: "'eqbards@onelist.com'" <eqbards@onelist.com>
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] Weapons of choice
>Date: Tue, Jun 22, 1999, 6:41 AM
>

>From: CMai <CMai@...>
>
>The dirk is the best weapon you can get for free at such a low lvl too. I
>was wondering if anyone can give me hint as to the gnoll that carry a
>Tomahawk and what lvl is it? I am currently lv 19. I just want to know at
>what lvl should I start getting a group together and go and kill it.
>
>Thnx in advance,
>Your Friendly Rogue and Bard
>Hammerpaw and Samiam
>Champions of Norrath, The Rathe
>
>
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Codo the Mysterious [mailto:codo@...]
>Sent: Monday, June 21, 1999 9:45 PM
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] Weapons of choice
>
>
>From: "Codo the Mysterious" <codo@...>
>
>Yes, a combine weapon is magical. They are nice weapons, but what you should
>really look into getting is a Dragoon Dirk. If my database of weapons is
>up-to-date, it would appear that there is only ONE combine weapon better
>than the Dirk....The 2 Handed Combine Sword. All I can say is...DIRK ROCKS.
>I just had the absolute BEST fortune to pick one up for free last night. I
>think I will be very happy with it indeed...
>
>Lulen
>9th Rank
>
